## Summary

## Related Issue

## Type of Change

* [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
* [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
* [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
* [ ] Documentation update

## Checklist

* [ ] My code targets the `develop` branch (not `main`).
* [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code.
* [ ] (Backend) I have formatted my code using Google Java Format.
* [ ] I have verified that my changes do not break the build locally.
* [ ] I have checked that no secrets or API keys are accidentally committed.

## Legal & Licensing

* [ ] **I agree** that this contribution is licensed under the **GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 (AGPLv3)**.
